resources.string: A version of I-Jetty appropriate to your Android release level must already be installed. You can download it from the Android Marketplace.

This is the installer for the Console WebApp for I-Jetty, which is the port of Jetty - the popular open-source web container - for the Android environment.

When installed into I-Jetty, this web app makes available information from your phone over the web, enabling you to browse and control your phone from your desktop browser, or any other device sharing the same LAN.

For more information about I-Jetty and other example web applications integrated with Android APIs, please visit http://code.google.com/p/i-jetty/.

For commercial support or custom I-Jetty developments please visit http://www.intalio.com/jetty.
I-Jetty is not installed. Please install it first.
An error has occurred. Unable to continue with installation.
A Console webapp is already installed. OK to re-install?
